instruction: Given a story, change the order of events and get a new storyline.
input: John had a really bad day. He woke up late, forgot his breakfast, and had to rush to work. On the way to work he noticed a homeless person whom he wanted to help but was running late. At work, John was reprimanded by his boss for not finishing his tasks.
output: John was running late for work so he didn't have time to stop to help a homeless person he noticed on the way. At work, his boss reprimanded him for not finishing his tasks. When John arrived home in the evening, he remembered that he had forgotten his breakfast and had a really bad day.
